mapper.insert: INSERT INTO webapp_transactions (id,status, prev_status,zone_time, ended_time, threading, getsby, sharesbby, banana_id) VALUES ( #{id},#{status},#{prev_status},#{zone_time}, #{ended_time}, #{jsonFromThreading}, #{getsby}, #{sharesby}, #{banana_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE webapp_transactions SET status=#{status}, threading=#{jsonFromThreading}, WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id transactions,bu.image_url,threading FROM webapp_banana b ,webapp_transactions t,webapp_bubble bu WHERE b.id=t.banana_id and b.bubble_id=bu.id and sharesbby=#{id}
SELECT t.id transactions,bu.image_url threading FROM webapp_banana b ,webapp_transactions t,webapp_bubble bu WHERE b.id=t.banana_id and b.bubble_id=bu.id and getsby=#{id}
select userid from webapp_banana where id = #{id}

insert into webapp_product ( name, price, selling_reason, product_info, tags ) values ( #{name}, #{price}, #{selling_reason}, #{productInfoByJson}, #{tagsByJson} )

) values ( #{userid}, #{thoughtId}, #{productId} )
